name: num nums
description:
Point and Long press your left mouse button to dash through the Pink Orbs !

ECS to pause the  game

If the game is laggy ,  please use Microsoft Edge, this for me improve the fps of the game

play as a space ship  to collect as much pink Orbs as you can! Keep moving or the  ship will collapse!  Collect Pink orbs to increase you're score, don't forget to comment you're highs score!

This Game was made for the GameDev Insider GameJam! I made the game,  got the music  from  my friend CraXx.

*the enemies are slightly over kill in my opinion but in the  mean time I can not change the code of the game to compensate this to keep the fairness  and the spirit of a game jam. this is all the progress I have does  with in the allotted time, hope you judge this for what it is, thank you so much !

**I have now updated the game so it can still be  played  in a browser,  if you have any problem with performance, try playing it in Microsoft Edge , this fixed my problem with FPS.  all the codes  has not been dramatically  changed  yet but made  some changes in  post processing  to lighten the load and the speed of game objects. Original Files are still available to download to check what I have changed  but nothing much.
